name: Slay.one
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 10, 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
